Description: Flat base and wall sherd of East Greek (South Ionian) pottery cup or bowl; pale orange clay with much silver mica; two rings painted on floor; two letters cut on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIII, no. 366)
Johnston 2006a / Trademarks on Greek Vases: Addenda (East Greek 196)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GE.856)
